Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class UltraSonicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltraSonicController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class UltraSonicController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class communicates with the US sensor and can be instantiated as a thread. The methods contained in this class with get the distance measured by the US sensor and filter that distance to return the most probable value.
    Author:
    charlesbourbeau

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean active
      Flag for stopping the controller.
      private int dist
      The distance to be shown in the display.
      private long endTick
      For calculating the central point.
      private static int invalidSampleCount
      The number of invalid samples seen by filter() so far.
      private int minDist
      The lowest distance seem.
      private long minTic
      Keep the ticCount when sensor see the newest lowest distance.
      private static int prevDistance
      The distance remembered by the filter() method.
      private static float[] usData
      Buffer (array) to store US samples.

        private static float[] usData
